infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take photos for your profile and events.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to select images for your profile and events.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to your microphone for live meetings and video calls.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to show nearby events and church locations.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Apostolic Army Global Church to access your camera to take photos for your profile and events.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with the community.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Apostolic Army Global Church to use your location to show nearby events and church locations.
